comments.body:
Can you please add idempotency tests? So for example here you would repeat the test from line 48 as:
`- name: create ec2 metric alarm on ec2 instance (idempotent)`
And assert that the result did not change.
Idempotency test has been added.  It should test both the changed property as well as the properties returned from the api call.
